alert.note: Alert for Camden; Gloucester; Mercer; Northwestern Burlington; Salem (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 10:42PM EST by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: ...LOW WATER LEVELS ON THE TIDAL DELAWARE RIVER THROUGH SATURDAY MORNING... A strong northwest wind will continue to cause low water levels on the tidal Delaware River and its tributaries into Saturday morning. The low water levels may cause navigation problems around the time of low tide. Water levels are expected to drop between 2 and 3 feet below Mean Lower Low Water along much of the tidal Delaware River. Low tide occurs at Reedy Point, Delaware at 4:16 AM Saturday. Low tide at the Philadelphia Coast Guard Station takes place at 6:51 AM. Low tide at Trenton occurs at 8:30 AM. The northwest wind is expected to diminish on Saturday morning and water levels should begin to return toward normal on Saturday afternoon and Saturday night.

area.areaDesc: Camden; Gloucester; Mercer; Northwestern Burlington; Salem
